thread.title: Voltas Share Price: Voltas shares 2.02% as Sensex rises - The Economic Times
thread.title_full: Voltas Share Price: Voltas shares 2.02% as Sensex rises - The Economic Times

title: Voltas Share Price: Voltas shares 2.02% as Sensex rises - The Economic Times
text: Shares of Voltas Ltd. traded 2.02 per cent at Rs 1693.10 at 11:34AM (IST) on Friday, even as BSE benchmark Sensex 233.51 points to 77853.72. The scrip had closed at Rs 1728.05 in the previous session. The stock quoted a 52-week high and 52-week low of Rs 1946.20 and Rs 989.35, respectively. As per BSE data, total traded volume on the counter till 11:34AM (IST) stood at 11:34AM shares with turnover at Rs 1.07 crore. At the prevailing price, the stock trades at 101.11 times its trailing 12-month EPS of Rs 16.75 per share and 6.27 times its price-to-book value, BSE data showed. A higher P/E ratio shows investors are willing to pay a higher share price today because of growth expectations in the future. Price-to-book value indicates the inherent value of a company and is the measure of the price that investors are ready to pay even for no growth in the business. The Beta value of the stock, which measures its volatility in relation to the broader market, stood at 1.1658. Shareholding Details Promoters held 30.3 per cent stake in the company as of 30-Sep-2024, while FIIs owned 18.09 per cent and DIIs 37.15 per cent.
